00020 
00021 AbsoluteEffect::AbsoluteEffect(const StateVectorRef &succ,
00022                                const StateVariables &dimensions)
00023 {
00024   StateVariables::const_iterator i;
00025   for (i = dimensions.begin(); i != dimensions.end(); ++i) {
00026     const unsigned index = i->first;
00027     assert(succ->size() > index);
00028     m_changes.push_back(std::make_pair(index, (*succ)[index]));
00029   }
00030 }
00031 
00032 AbsoluteEffect::~AbsoluteEffect()
00033 {}
00034 
00035 StateVectorRef AbsoluteEffect::apply(const StateVectorRef &s) const
00036 {
00037   boost::shared_ptr<std::vector<double> > result(new std::vector<double>(*s));
00038   std::vector<std::pair<unsigned,double> >::const_iterator i;
00039   for (i = m_changes.begin(); i != m_changes.end(); ++i) {
00040     assert(result->size() > i->first);
00041     (*result)[i->first] = i->second;
00042   }
00043   return result;
00044 }

00067 void StateActionModel::debug(std::ostream &out) const
00068 {
00069   out << "StateActionModel " << state() << ": r = " << reward() << "\n";
00070   EffectDistribution::const_iterator i;
00071   double p = 1.0;
00072   for (i = effects().begin(); i != effects().end(); ++i) {
00073     out << "\t" << i->second << ": " << i->first << "\n";
00074     p -= i->second;
00075   }
00076   if (p > 0)
00077     out << "\t" << p << ": terminate\n";
00078 }
00079 
00080 void StateActionModel::notify_model_observers() {
00081   size_t index = 0;
00082   while (index < m_observers.size()) {
00083     if (m_observers[index].expired())
00084       m_observers.erase(m_observers.begin() + index);
00085     else {
00086       ObserverRef observer(m_observers[index++]);
00087       observer->observe_model_change();
00088     }
00089   }
00090 }
